data.name: Timekeeping
data.desc: Web-based application for a store's employee management, including recruitment, time-keeping, reporting, and payroll.
benefitsFromProject: One entry point for a store manager to handle all employee-related tasks
Improved accuracy in time-keeping and payroll
Integration with BI tools for advanced reporting
Enhanced recruitment process with applicant tracking

data.name: Retail Application Platform
data.desc: Aplicaton platform with flexible architecture to support multiple retail applications.
benefitsFromProject: Modular architecture allowing for easy addition of new applications
Shared services and components to reduce development time
Scalable design to handle increasing user load
Consistent user experience across different applications

data.name: Airline's Representative Portal
data.desc: Mobile friendly web-based application to capture and report ground handling operations.
benefitsFromProject: Streamlined reporting process for ground handling operations
Mobile accessibility for representatives in the field
Enhanced communication between ground staff and airline management
